DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate effect experimental toothpaste maintain gingival health 24 week period measure modified gingival index , bleeding , plaque , plaque bacteria . Prior commence study treatment , subject undergo dental prophylaxis follow 2 week period oral hygiene instruction weekly professional tooth clean bring subject optimum gingival health prior commence study treatment .
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject age 18 year old A minimum 20 permanent gradable teeth For baseline eligibility , subject must minimum Modified Gingival Index score 1.52.3 .
